pkgmetadata.longdescription: Testing Homoscedasticity, Multivariate Normality, and Missing Completely at Random // To test whether the missing data mechanism, in a set of incompletely observed data, is one of missing completely at random (MCAR). For detailed description see Jamshidian, M. Jalal, S., and Jansen, C. (2014). "MissMech: An R Package for Testing Homoscedasticity, Multivariate Normality, and Missing Completely at Random (MCAR)", Journal of Statistical Software, 56(6), 1-31. https://www.jstatsoft.org/v56/i06/ doi:10.18637/jss.v056.i06.
